if (this.databaseConnectionPromise) return this.databaseConnectionPromise; if (this.mode === "slave" && this.driver.isReplicated) { this.databaseConnectionPromise = this.driver.obtainSlaveConnection().then(connection => { this.databaseConnection = connection;
